MetDNA2 0.5.22

    • Instruction of MetDNA2

annotateMRN

annotateMRN.Rd
annotateMRN(
  annotation_result = "ms2_match_annotation_result.csv",
  ms2_data = "ms2",
  prefer_adduct = c("all", "M+H", "M+Na", "M-H"),
  use_default_md = TRUE,
  metdna_version = c("version2", "version1"),
  scoring_approach = c("dp", "bonanza", "hybrid", "gnps"),
  direction = c("reverse", "forward"),
  instrument = c("SciexTripleTOF", "AgilentQTOF", "BrukerQTOF", "ThermoOrbitrap",
    "ThermoExploris", "AgilentDTIMMS", "BrukerTIMS"),
  lib = c("zhuMetLib", "zhuMetLib_orbitrap", "fiehnHilicLib"),
  column = c("hilic", "rp"),
  method_lc = c("Amide12min", "Amide23min", "Other"),
  excluded_adduct = NULL,
  polarity = c("positive", "negative"),
  extension_step = c("0", "1", "2", "3", "4", "5", "6", "7", "8"),
  threads = 3,
  path = ".",
  max_isotope = 4,
  mz_tol = 25,
  rt_tol1 = 3,
  rt_tol2 = 30,
  ccs_tol = 4,
  cor_tol = 0,
  int_tol = 500,
  dp_tol = 0.5,
  matched_frag_tol = 1,
  max_step = 3,
  score_cutoff = 0,
  remain = FALSE,
  remain_per = 0.5,
  seed_neighbor_match_plot = TRUE,
  candidate_num = 3,
  test_old_mrn = c("v0.3", "v0.4"),
  test_adduct_version = c("version2", "version1"),
  ...
)

Arguments

annotation_result

"ms2_match_annotation_result.csv"
ms2_data

'ms2'
prefer_adduct

prefer adduct for RT prediction, including "all", "M+H", "M+Na", "M-H". Default: 'M+H'
use_default_md

Whether use default MD.
metdna_version

MetDNA version, 'version1', 'version2'. Default: 'version2'
direction

'forward', 'reverse'. Default: 'reverse'
column

'hilic', 'rp'
method_lc

'Amide12min', 'Amide23min', 'Other'
excluded_adduct

NULL
polarity

'positive', 'negative'. Default: 'positive'
extension_step

The used extended MRN with n step reaction. Steps: '0', '1', '2', '3', '4', '5', '6', '7', '8'
threads

Default: 4
path

'.'
max_isotope

Maximum considerable isotope. Default: 4
mz_tol

Default: 25 ppm
rt_tol1

RT tolerance of adductAnnotation and isotopeAnnotation. Default: 3s
rt_tol2

RT tolerance of metAnnotation. Default: 30

cor_tolDefault: 0

int_tolisotope intensity tolerance. Defautl: 500

dp_tol0.5

max_stepthe maximum step of reaction pair during recursive annotation

score_cutoffTotal score cutoff. Default: 0

remainFALSE

remain_per0.5

seed_neighbor_match_plotTRUE

candidate_numreserve top N candidate number. Default: 3

Useseed from reserved match or forward match. 'forward', 'reverse'. Default: 'reverse'
